title: SKILL.md Frontmatter
description: Validates YAML frontmatter in SKILL.md files. Union of OpenCode and Claude Code fields.

name.description: Skill identifier. Must match the containing directory name.

description.description: What the skill does and when to use it. Agents use this to decide whether to load the skill.

disable-model-invocation.description: Claude Code: if true, only the user can invoke via /name.

user-invocable.description: Claude Code: if false, hidden from / menu (model-only).

allowed-tools.description: Claude Code: comma-separated tool names permitted without approval.

context.description: Claude Code: set to 'fork' to run in an isolated subagent.

agent.description: Claude Code: subagent type when context is fork (e.g. Explore, Plan).

model.description: Claude Code: model override when this skill is active.

tags.description: Loadout: flat classification tags for grouping skills by function/domain.
